companies.title: Software Developer Intern
tasks: Assisted in the development of web applications for data processing and visualization, contributing to feature integration and user experience improvements.
Supported the enforcement of coding standards and best practices in collaborative projects.
Participated in training sessions and mentorship programs under the guidance of senior developers.
Collaborated with back-end engineers, front-end developers, and QA testers to assist in project execution.
Contributed to optimizing application performance and ensuring data integrity.
Developed and tested dynamic and responsive websites using technologies such as HTML5, JavaScript, ReactJS, and CSS.

companies.title: Junior Software Developer
tasks: Assisted in the development of full-stack applications using various technologies and frameworks.
Supported debugging and performance tuning efforts to improve application speed and functionality.
Helped address and resolve client-reported issues related to web development.
Contributed to deployment processes and maintained relational and NoSQL databases.
Assisted in the development and maintenance of web-based software solutions.

companies.title: Technical Support Intern
tasks: Assisted with the installation of technical equipment on-site.
Helped diagnose and repair malfunctioning or damaged equipment.
Provided customer support and guidance on the operation and maintenance of technical equipment.
